long_description: YMDUCH Womens Off Shoulder Sleeveless Bodycon Mermaid Long Formal Evening Party Cocktail Evening Dress gives you a long dressy silhouette that looks refined without relying on heavy embellishment. It is a strong option for weddings formal dinners holiday parties and other nights where you want clean lines and confident shape. Fabric: Polyester and Spandex fabric the fabric is soft and stretchy and comfortable to wear. Unique design: sleeveless off shoulder design you can also choose not to strap on as needed V shaped backless design on the back the skirt of the long evening dress is a mermaid design the skirt The length allows you to wear high heels and mop the floor. It can make you more elegant and dignified. Evening dresses cocktail parties parties clubs graduations important business meetings weddings bridesmaid dresses birthday parties portraits and other important formal occasions can be worn. A dignified and elegant long dress. Wear it with accessories such as a clutch high heels and necklaces. There are five different sizes for you to choose from: S=(US4 6) M=(US8 10)，L=(US12 14)，XL=(US16 18) XXL=(US 20) the dress is stretchy for more sizing details please refer to the product description;please check it before you buy!. Go to Your Orders to start the return. Fit and feel: stretch friendly feel for easier movement bodycon shape through the waist and hips mermaid style hem that opens near the bottom. Style it with heels and a simple clutch for a classic formal finish or add a jacket for cooler evenings. Keep jewelry minimal if you want the neckline and back detail to stay the focus. Details: Department: womens; Date First Available: March 17 2022. Sizing tip: use the size chart as the final check. If you are between sizes or want a less snug fit sizing up is usually the safer call.

items.author: Michella
items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2025
items.body: I had no wedding dress a week before my wedding (i got ripped off) and was on the search for next day shipping dresses on here.. which options were not many so I’m glad i found this dress!! It fit me true to size (even the length was perfect) and it accentuates your curves. I was really impressed with the quality, it is sturdy and comfortable, all that for a great price. It looks so elegant and the color is very rich. I followed another reviewer and got myself a waist accessory to give it a pop of color. Highly recommend this dress for formal events or like in my case, a wedding if thats your thing!

items.author: MsAri
items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2025
items.body: Excellent fit! Purchased size M. I'm 5"2 and usually wear size 6 and this dress was perfect! The material was easy to iron. Enough stretch if needed and very flattering! I thought the length was going to be an issue but it wasn't. Would def recommend!

items.author: Onnie
items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2025
items.body: I had a black tie wedding to go to and last minute ordered this dress in medium, turns out to be one of my favorite Amazon purchases. It looks so classy and the fabric is nice and thick. It hugs you in all the right places and the off the shoulder is crafted perfectly to stay that way all night without too much tugging and pulling. I ordered a size medium and I’m 5’10” 160 lbs. I wore about a three inch heel and it sit nicely above my shoes. Didn’t touch the ground but didn’t look to short either. I was able to dance and move while still looking classy. Got tons of compliments! Look no further!

items.author: Nicole L Deshong
items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2025
items.body: Exceeded expectations on “quality” feel. As others said material is nice thickness of scuba material. Hugs curves. Sooo flattering! Looks way more expensive. The neckline is a bit awkward and have to keep pulling down into place. Other than that feels way better than the price point. Worth it! Took a lot of steaming to get wrinkles out.

items.author: Leann Gibson-Griffin
items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2025
items.body: Great dress. Very comfortable and fit was perfect! I’ve never had a dress fit this well without alterations. Material is thick and quality. Looks much more expensive than you would think. Btw, I’m short 5’4” and don’t wear high heels. I have on aerosol block heels. The length was perfect.

items.author: Customer
items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
items.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2025
items.body: I am thrilled with this dress! I bought it for a gala and haven’t worn it for the event yet but just tried it on. I am 5’3” so it does hang on the ground when barefoot but with just 2” heels or so it hits the floor just right. It’s a beautiful shape and beautiful fabric that is thick but not hot. It’s got enough stretch where it feels incredibly comfortable and not like I’m wearing a formal dress but looks very elegant. I will be wearing spanx because it is form fitting around the stomach and hips, but still not tight do doesn’t feel uncomfortable - just shows everything. The shoulders drape just like the picture and if it goes off one shoulder, it does make the seam look a bit sideways in the back, but for some reason, not the other shoulder.
